title: Casa da Pamonha
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Food is typical of many vegetarian-vegan restaurants in Brazil. May have little or no vegan options. Vegans please inquire and inform HappyCow. Directions: Just off main square where the famed Teatro Amazonas is located, approximately 100 metres away where Rua Barroso opens half way along the square on the south side.
